long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Import testimonials and reviews from 100s of websites and share them everywhere you need.

Installing Senja's social proof Chrome Extension means you never miss out on the proof you need to convert, close or convince.

With the free Senja Chrome Extension:

🗃️ Import testimonials from 100s of websites in two clicks

💌 Grab your text or video testimonial collection form

🔍 Search or filter for the most relevant approved testimonial

🪁 Share testimonials as images, widgets, or links

🤝 Invite your whole team to have access to every testimonial your business has collected
